name: Ultimate Block Puzzle Jack Adventure
description:
Ultimate Block Puzzle Ultimate Block Puzzle is an exciting game where you must use your powers as masters of blocks, to free the universe from an infestation of blocks of another dimension full of black matter, do not let your bad spreads in this world we rely on your abilities. And good luck on your journey.

Players move and rotate the bricks to form a horizontal row to score and complete the levels.
The game has 2 modes:
- Classic mode: you play to score the highest score possible
- Challenge mode: you pass the levels by destroying the gray bricks
Let's play and feel
